resPropDefs.name: IMCL_Location
resPropDefs.label: IMCL_Location
resPropDefs.description: IBM Installation Manager Command Line Interface Location

children.pluginName: IBM UrbanCode Deploy Versioned File Storage
children.name: Download Artifacts

properties.scriptBody:
dir
echo "${p:resource/work.dir}/${p:component.name}"
echo "${p:component/custom/response_file_location}"
echo '${p:resource/BPM 857 Install or Uninstall/IMCL_Location}

echo "Cleaning up Working Directory"
dir
del /S /Q *.*
echo "Not Enough Diskspace"

edges.from: Remove Any Leftover Directories from Uninstall

edges.to: Remove Any Leftover Directories from Uninstall

offsets.name: Remove Any Leftover Directories from Uninstall

properties.scriptBody:
echo "Current Directory'
cd ${p:resource/BPM 857 Install or Uninstall/IMCL_Directory}
Dir
echo "Uninstalling BPM Products"
imcl uninstall com.ibm.websphere.ND.v85 com.ibm.websphere.IBMJAVA.v70 com.ibm.bpm.ADV.v85 com.ibm.ws.DB2EXP.winia64  -installationDirectory ${p:resource/BPM 857 Install or Uninstall/BPM_Install_Dir} -log C:\temp\uninstall.log

cd ${p:resource/BPM 857 Install or Uninstall/BPM_Uninstall_Parent_Dir}
dir WebSphere

echo "Property Values"
echo ${p:resource/BPM 857 Install or Uninstall/BPM_Install_Dir}

cd ${p:resource/BPM 857 Install or Uninstall/BPM_Uninstall_Parent_Dir}
rmdir /S /Q WebSphere

children.name: Remove Any Leftover Directories from Uninstall

resPropDefs.name: IMCL_Location
resPropDefs.label: IMCL_Location
resPropDefs.description: IBM Installation Manager Command Line Interface Location

children.pluginName: IBM UrbanCode Deploy Versioned File Storage
children.name: Download Artifacts

properties.scriptBody:
dir
echo "${p:resource/work.dir}/${p:component.name}"
echo "${p:component/custom/response_file_location}"
echo '${p:resource/BPM 857 Install or Uninstall/IMCL_Location}

echo "Cleaning up Working Directory"
dir
del /S /Q *.*
echo "Not Enough Diskspace"

cd ${p:environment/WAS_NODE_BIN_PATH}
startserver ${p:environment/PSNODE_CLUSTER_MEMBER_NAME}
echo "Starting Deployment Manager"
echo "Starting Node Agent"
echo "Starting Cluster Member"

propDefs.name: appEditDesc
propDefs.label: Application Edition Description
propDefs.description: The description of the edition of the application in WebSphere.

propDefs.name: appedition
propDefs.label: Application Edition
propDefs.description: The edition of the application in WebSphere. We recommend using the component version name(${p:version.name})

propDefs.name: appName
propDefs.label: Application Name
propDefs.description: The name of the application in WebSphere

propDefs.name: roleMappings
propDefs.label: Role To User Mappings
propDefs.description: The role mappings to be updated. Newline separated list of format roleName->Allow Access To everyone(yes|no)->Allow Access To authenticated users(yes|no)->user1|user2->group1|group2. You can obtain this information for you application by using wsadmin print AdminApp.taskInfo('EarFileLocation', 'MapRolesToUsers')

propDefs.name: resourceMappings
propDefs.label: Resource To EJB Mappings
propDefs.description: The resource references to be updated. Newline separated list of format moduleName->bean->uri->resourceReference->resourceType->targetJNDIName. You can obtain this information for you application by using wsadmin print AdminApp.taskInfo('EarFileLocation', 'MapResRefToEJB')

propDefs.name: earFile
propDefs.label: Ear File
propDefs.description: The EAR file for this applicaiton

properties.scriptBody: wsadmin.bat -lang jython  -user ${p:resource/websphere.user} -password ${p:resource/websphere.password} -conntype SOAP -port ${p:resource/websphere.port} -c "print AdminTask.BPMShowProcessApplication('[-containerAcronym ${p:component/Process applicaton acronym}]')"
echo "Running Command"
echo ${P:environment/env.type}
